title: Hex
description:
All digital rips of the Jonah Hex and All Star Western series (to date) as well as his undead appearance in the Green Lantern Blackest Night story.

Brilliant western series by Jimmy Palmiotti and Justin Gray. 

Originally starts out as historically authentic one off morality plays and character sketches. Refreshing insofar as the series is not weighed down with D.C. Universe baggage. One can easily access simple stories driven by complex characters.

All Star Western takes an interesting turn as Jonah Hex is integrated into the D.C. Universe, but maintains Hex's core character and morality that enables him to navigate the era of industrialization/urbanization as well as the 21st century.

Also included in the files are Hex's animated appearances in m4v format. If your media player has any issues, retitle the suffixes to mp4.

Credit to the original digital rippers / editors.
